body:
This pull request was originally intended as a way to simplify #99 

After testing, I noticed the following problem:

```
$ spack versions cmake
==> Error: Cannot fetch versions for package Cmake because it does not define any URLs to fetch.
```

By adding a url variable, this problem is now solved:

```
$ spack versions cmake
==> Safe versions (already checksummed):
  3.4.3  3.4.0  3.3.1  3.0.2  2.8.10.2
==> Remote versions (not yet checksummed):
  3.4.2  3.4.1
```

While I was at it, I added the latest available version.
title: Add url for cmake, simplify url_for_version
